summary: This is a forwarded email from July 2, 2020, regarding the transmission of a revised search warrant bundle from the SDNY (Southern District of New York) related to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings and document preparation.

events.title: Transmission of Revised SDNY Search Warrant Bundle
events.description: An email is sent forwarding the 'SDNY Premises Search Warrant Bundle (second revised) copy' to an unspecified recipient, indicating updates or revisions to legal documents related to a premises search.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 2, 2020, concerning the Epstein case.
It references a 'SDNY Premises Search Warrant Bundle (second revised) copy', indicating ongoing legal document preparation or revision.
The email is forwarded from an iPhone, suggesting mobile communication among involved parties.
The attachment includes a PDF file and an HTML file, showing the transmission of digital legal documents.
The correspondence involves the US Attorney's Office for the District of New Hampshire (USANH), indicating inter-district legal coordination.
